LanguageData.VG_industrialfermenting.label: industrial fermenting
LanguageData.VG_industrialfermenting.description: Research construction methods of a much larger fermenting barrels. Allow 3 times the amount of products to be made in the same amount of time.
LanguageData.VG_PrecursorBulk.label: bulk precursor recipes
LanguageData.VG_PrecursorBulk.description: Research brewing methods of msking much larger batches of precurosr. Allow 4 times the amount of products to be made.
